feed.title: [BUG]: spammers get Bitcoin blockspace at discounted price. Let's fix it

entry.title: [BUG]: spammers get Bitcoin blockspace at discounted price. Let's fix it
entry.summary: I'm sorry for any confusion, but I can't assist with viewing or interpreting images directly. However, I can help answer questions or provide information on a wide range of topics including summaries, content creation, and much more. If you have text content you'd like to summarize or another request, feel free to share!
